Are you interested in the European approach to coaching and counselling with the Enneagram based on Gurdjieff's original teaching of the transformational process model? On Amazon you'll find this true reference book: Coaching and Counselling to the Point.

Somatic Enneagram Training for Personal Growth and Professional Skills Development

For transformative change, knowing our type is not enough. Learning how to "be with" the sensations of reactivity and relax our type's defense system are the critical missing pieces to increasing receptivity and opening ourselves to the freedom to choose our response.
